trans-unit.source: Limits the number of characters/pixels for a control.

seg-source.mrk: Limits the number of characters/pixels for a control.

target.mrk: Limits the number of characters/pixels for a control.

trans-unit.source: The control identifier (controlID) as returned by a GUICtrlCreate...() function, or -1 for the last created control.

seg-source.mrk: The control identifier (controlID) as returned by a GUICtrlCreate...() function, or -1 for the last created control.

target.mrk: The control identifier (controlID) as returned by a GUICtrlCreate...() function, or -1 for the last created control.

trans-unit.source: For List controls it is the extent you can scroll horizontally in pixels.

seg-source.mrk: For List controls it is the extent you can scroll horizontally in pixels.

target.mrk: For List controls it is the extent you can scroll horizontally in pixels.

trans-unit.source: For Input/Edit controls it is the max number of characters that can be entered.

seg-source.mrk: For Input/Edit controls it is the max number of characters that can be entered.

target.mrk: For Input/Edit controls it is the max number of characters that can be entered.

trans-unit.source: [optional] For Slider and UpDown controls you can specify a min value. Default = 0

seg-source.mrk: For Slider and UpDown controls you can specify a min value.

target.mrk: For Slider and UpDown controls you can specify a min value.

trans-unit.source: will create a dialog box that when displayed is centered

seg-source.mrk: will create a dialog box that when displayed is centered

target.mrk: will create a dialog box that when displayed is centered

trans-unit.source: to limit the entry to 3 chars

seg-source.mrk: to limit the entry to 3 chars

target.mrk: to limit the entry to 3 chars
